data.title: Shortcuts in Zoom Desktop
data.content:
1.Mute or unmute audio: Alt + A
2.Mute the entire group at once: Alt + M
3.Start or stop video: Alt + V
4.Pause or resume screen sharing: Alt + S
5.Start recording a meeting: Alt + R
6.Pause or resume screen recording: Alt + P
7.Switch camera: Alt + N
8.Raise or lower hand: Alt + Y
9.Open the invite window instantly: Alt + I

The shortcuts commands are listed for Windows PC users. Mac users will want to substitute the Apple or Command key for the Alt key above.
